ja455:12.2: muttamādāya kuñjaro → kāsirājena pesito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | mutto dāmāto kuñjaro (pts-vp-pli1ed, bj -nissya)
ja455:13.3: Soṇḍāyūdakamāhatvā → soṇḍāya udakamāhatvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | soṇḍāya udakamāhitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja455:14.2: akālenapi vassati → akālena pavassati (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | akālena'tivassati (pts-vp-pli1ed)
